summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3286, for the improvement of West 59th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 36th Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40798 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
